text:
I'm so happy right now! I've just had my first #COVID19 #vaccine 🎉💉

I'm already looking forward to the 2nd dose! 

The volunteers at the GP surgery in #Gloucester were amazing. It was brilliantly organised & very quick!

#vaccinated 
#VaccinesWork 
#BusyLivingWithMets https://t.co/T99HOHzP8O
